Text: all the writing through the movie is in spansih.. it's a lot of .. well everything is in spanish.  it buggers up a half dozen scenes of the movie for those who haven't seen it before.. and kids who can't guess what it's supposed to say.
Credits, captions and all verbiage is in Spanish.   Video quality is not good, suffering from artifacts, jagged edges and not very sharp.  Fair re-encode at best.
